class.name: RandomStraightLinePointGenerator

javadoc.text: Factory for generating a cloud of points that approximate a straight line.
RNG for the error on the y-coordinate.

The generator will create a cloud of points whose x-coordinates * will be randomly sampled between {@code xLo} and {@code xHi}, and * the corresponding y-coordinates will be computed as * 

 * y = a x + b + N(0, error)
 *
* where {@code N(mean, sigma)} is a Gaussian distribution with the * given mean and standard deviation.
javadoc.param: sigma Standard deviation on the y-coordinate of the point.
lo Lowest value of the x-coordinate.
hi Highest value of the x-coordinate.
n Number of points to create.
